item.title: LOG 1.13: Spring 'time', German and the 60´s
item.description: 31st March, 2011 After some rain last night, the air smells like monsoon in India; so fresh and clean! I´ve opened the window to let it come in and along with it are the chirps and tweets of the birds.

item.title: Suhani Raat Dhal Chuki: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This is a soothing, sweet, romantic Hindi song from the 1949. **Suhani Raat Dhal Chuki, Na Jaane Tum Kab Aaoge, Jahan Ki Rut Badal Chuki, Na Jaane Tum Kab Aaoge,**

item.title: Oraayiram Paarvayile Lyrics and Translation
item.description: I’ve always found this song very hauntingly romantic. **Nooru murai piranthaalum nooru murai iranthaalum Unai pirinthu vegu thooram naan oru naalum povathillai Ulagaththin kanngalile uruvangal marainthaalum

item.title: Types of Love: An Analysis.
item.description: It is perhaps important to differentiate the various meaning that we refer to when we say the word love. Often ‘love’ is used in the place of a more suitable word.
